Text:
Hi Nepotu,

I look forward to the Dallas game when you have it. 

I want to thank you for the great quality videos on the NFL season & the NCAA. The BIG Bowl games will be great to watch, no matter which ones are on TPB.

I wish you the very best for 2013 & THANK YOU!

You are A CLASS ACT !

All the Best !!
My dear friend, always with the great words, I want to wish you a HNY, all the best in the world and I hope to be at your expectations one year on.
